branchCategory.name: MB-Z
branchCategory.description: The MB series is a light weight, medium duty tie rod cylinder. Available bore sizes range from 32mm to 125mm. The standard air cushion utilizes a floating cushion seal to eliminate piston rod bouncing. The MB series is available with many standard options, which include stroke adjustment, tandem, high/low temperature seals, heavy rod scraper, non-rotating rod, double rod and many more.

branchItem.name: M(D)B-Z, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod
branchItem.description: The MB single rod, double acting, light weight, medium duty tie rod cylinder. Available bore sizes range from 32mm to 125mm. The standard air cushion utilizes a floating cushion seal to eliminate piston rod bouncing. Also available with a rubber end of stroke cushion instead of air cushion.

branchItem.name: M(D)BW-Z, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Double Rod
branchItem.description: The MB double rod, double acting, light weight, medium duty tie rod cylinder. Available bore sizes range from 32mm to 125mm. The standard air cushion utilizes a floating cushion seal to eliminate piston rod bouncing.

branchItem.name: M(D)BK-Z, Air Cylinder, Non-rotating, Single Rod
branchItem.description: The MB series is a light weight, medium duty tie rod cylinder. Available bore sizes range from 32mm to 125mm. The standard air cushion utilizes a floating cushion seal to eliminate piston rod bouncing. The MB series is available with many standard options, which include stroke adjustment, tandem, high/low temperature seals, heavy rod scraper, non-rotating rod, double rod and many more.

branchItem.name: M(D)BKW-Z, Air Cylinder, Non-rotating, Double Acting, Double Rod
branchItem.description: The MB series is a light weight, medium duty tie rod cylinder. Available bore sizes range from 32mm to 125mm. The standard air cushion utilizes a floating cushion seal to eliminate piston rod bouncing. The MB series is available with many standard options, which include stroke adjustment, tandem, high/low temperature seals, heavy rod scraper, non-rotating rod, double rod and many more.
branchItem.bullets: <ul><li>Double acting, non rotating double rod</li><li>Bore sizes: 32, 40, 50, 63, 80, 100 (mm)</li><li>Strokes from 25mm through 700mm depending upon bore size</li><li>Mounts: basic, foot, flange, & center trunnion</li><li>With or without nylon or heat resistant rod boot, one end only</li><li>Variety of switches and a variety of lead wire lengths</li></ul>

branchItem.name: M(D)BY-Z, Smooth Air Cylinder
branchItem.description: The MB single rod, double acting, smooth acting, light weight, medium duty tie rod cylinder. Perfect for low pressure or low speed applications. Available bore sizes range from 32mm to 125mm.

branchItem.name: M(D)BB, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, End Lock
branchItem.description: <p>The MB series medium duty tie rod cylinder offers an improved design that enhances cylinder operation and ease of use. The standard air cushion utilizes a floating cushion seal to eliminate piston rod bouncing. The cushion volume has been elevated permitting about 30% more allowable kinetic energy absorption. The port and captive cushion adjustment valve are located on the same side of cap for heightened access. The MB series is available with many standard options, which include stroke adjustment, tandem, high/low temperature seals, heavy rod scraper, non-rotating rod, double rod and many more.  </p>

branchItem.name: M(D)BQ, Air Cylinder, Low Friction, Single Rod
branchItem.description: The MB series is a light weight, medium duty tie rod cylinder. Available bore sizes range from 32mm to 125mm. The standard air cushion utilizes a floating cushion seal to eliminate piston rod bouncing. The MB series is available with many standard options, which include stroke adjustment, tandem, high/low temperature seals, heavy rod scraper, non-rotating rod, double rod and many more.

branchItem.name: M(D)B1-Z, Square Tube, Double Acting, Single Rod, Standard
branchItem.description: The MB1 single rod, double acting, light weight, medium duty tie rod cylinder. The MB1 utilizes a profile tube that enclose the tie rods. Available bore sizes range from 32mm to 125mm. The standard air cushion utilizes a floating cushion seal to eliminate piston rod bouncing. Also available with a rubber end of stroke cushion instead of air cushion.

branchItem.name: M(D)B1W-Z, Square Tube, Double Acting, Double Rod, Standard
branchItem.description: The MB1 double rod, double acting, light weight, medium duty tie rod cylinder. The MB1 utilizes a profile tube that enclose the tie rods. Available bore sizes range from 32mm to 125mm. The standard air cushion utilizes a floating cushion seal to eliminate piston rod bouncing.

branchItem.description: <p>The MB series medium duty tie rod cylinder offers an improved design that enhances cylinder operation and ease of use. The standard air cushion utilizes a floating cushion seal to eliminate piston rod bouncing. The cushion volume has been elevated permitting about 30% more allowable kinetic energy absorption. The port and captive cushion adjustment valve are located on the same side of cap for heightened access.
